title: Child recovering after being accidentally shot in Petaluma home
content:
PETALUMA (KRON) — A 11-month-old baby girl is recovering from being accidentally shot in a Petaluma home Saturday night, police said.
At around 6:15 p.m., police received a report that a baby had accidentally been shot in a home on the east side of Petaluma.
Police brought the child to arriving paramedics from the Petaluma Fire Department.
The child was then rushed to Santa Rosa Memorial Hospital and flown to Children’s Hospital in Oakland.
The child is expected to survive, police said.
Investigators are not currently planning to make any arrests.
